name: Pirates in the Caribbean
description:
'Pirates in the Caribbean'

This game takes place in... shocking, the Caribbean, around the end of the pirate golden age in the mid 1700's, featuring you as the captain and as such, you make the choices, some of which may have an impact on you and your crew which all leads to the many endings that this game is parent to.

This game is the end result of a beautiful and intelligent team with collaboration with others that through trial and error through previous games have slowly fixed the holes in the ship and with this game, we are proud to present to you as our golden jewel.
